subject: Happy New Year & Affiliate Commission Payment Request
description_text:
Hello SIMSONN Team,

Happy New Year!
We hope you are doing well and that your business is starting the year
positively. Wishing SIMSONN continued growth and success in 2026.

We are writing to kindly follow up regarding our *affiliate commission
payment*. According to our affiliate dashboard, the commission has already
been recorded and is currently pending.

Commission details:

   -

   *Amount pending:* $588.02
   -

   *Amount paid:* $0.00

We kindly request that the pending commission be *processed for payment*,
so we can continue working with peace of mind and remain fully focused on
promoting the SIMSONN project.

For your reference, our PayPal payment details are:
*PayPal email:* mcburrowsreali963@gmail.com

We have *attached screenshots* from our affiliate dashboard for your
reference.

Best regards,
[image: image.png]

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 10359 中
